short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Looks up online Cambridge Dictionary (include all the definition and translation dictionaries) for the selected text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just right-click on the selected text and choose "Cambridge Dictionary...". Before that, you can choose a dictionary that you want on the Cambridge Dictionary popup (click on the extension's icon to show the popup). And you can also lookup there. 

*NOTES:
After installing the extension, don't forget to pin the icon on the browser toolbar.
